abstract: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ordered GE Capital Retail Bank to repay customers who were victims of deceptive credit-card tactics.
snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ordered GE Capital Retail Bank to repay customers who were victims of deceptive credit-card tactics.
lead_paragraph: It might sound like a good idea at the time: You’re at the dentist’s office, and the receptionist offers you a way to stretch payments for an expensive procedure over many months, apparently with no interest.

headline.main: A Medical Credit Card Has Surprising Costs
